snippet.title: 34EVERLAST /2nd Trailer / PC:Steam
snippet.description:
Steam page OPEN !!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2134470/34EVERLAST/

34EVERLAST /2nd Trailer / PC:Steam

Music : LEVEREVEさん/@jp__s
CV : ナユキユズさん/@sc_nayu

34EVERLAST is

'AAA-style game you can buy and complete before bed on a weeknight.'

'I have to go to work in a few hours... But I want to play the game! I want to clear it! I want to be impressed!'
Super-concentrated action entertainment' for the gamers of the past who are exhausted from work.

You can complete the game in as little as 10 minutes, so you can finish it before you go to bed.
No tutorial, easy controls and exhilarating action!
No game over even if you lose to the boss.
No stressful game over even if you lose to a boss.

Enjoy a completely new game experience that fits into the small gaps in today's entertainment-filled society.

[PressKit]
http://kanata-labo.com/presskit.html

#UE4 #gamedev #IndieGameDev
